item.title: Weekly Recap - 2025-08-15
item.description: Like what you read or watched from the recap? I'd love if you helped share on Reddit or Daily.dev so others can see! Weekly Recap FORGET The Generic Resume Fluff! Focus On Impact As A Developer! Is this resume a bit too fluffy? Let's see if we can identify some opportunities for this senior software engineer to REALLY showcase all of the awesome impactful work that they've done! Does This Developer Intern Resume Stand A Chance?
